welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wetter (Ruhr), Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscape and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that Wetter has to offer and enjoy your stay here."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, mostly used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly built terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
